latestVersion.disclaimer: DISCLAIMER: These datasets are provided "as is" and in no event shall Bioversity International be liable for any damages resulting from use of the data. While great effort was taken to obtain high quality data, the accuracy or reliability of the data is not guaranteed or warranted in any way. Bioversity International encourages the use of these datasets, but emphasizes that many of them contain "raw data" files. When applicable, all information which would allow individuals to be identified has been deleted from the files. For some of the datasets, the user will need to take care in handling missing observations, outlier values and violations of logical consistency.

fields.value: Maps of Volta basin hydrometeorogical baselines

dsDescriptionValue.value: 13 reference maps of Volta basin maps showing sub-basin watersheds, water monitoring stations, topography, climate monitoring stations, dam locations

keywordValue.value: Hydrology, Volta basin, dam, climate monitoring

fields.value: Received by Sarah Jones from Valentin Iogo (VBA).

files.description: 13 reference maps of Volta basin maps showing sub-basin watersheds, water monitoring stations, topography, climate monitoring stations, dam locations
files.label: VBA_Volta_Maps_2010_00_Hydrometeorologic baselines.pdf

dataFile.description: 13 reference maps of Volta basin maps showing sub-basin watersheds, water monitoring stations, topography, climate monitoring stations, dam locations

files.description: Maps from Nov 2010 showing dam capacity, power network, irrigated area, minerals / mining activities, protected areas, population with access to drinking water and drinking water source
files.label: VBA_Volta_Maps_2010_03_Etat_Des_Lieux.pdf

dataFile.description: Maps from Nov 2010 showing dam capacity, power network, irrigated area, minerals / mining activities, protected areas, population with access to drinking water and drinking water source

files.description: Baseline maps from Dec 2011 showing geology, hydrogeology, topography, soil type, discharge rates, recharge rates, and water authority boundaries
files.label: VBA_Volta_Maps_2011_01_Contexte_General.pdf

dataFile.description: Baseline maps from Dec 2011 showing geology, hydrogeology, topography, soil type, discharge rates, recharge rates, and water authority boundaries

files.description: Maps from Dec 2011 showing social data overlaid on environmental, e.g. % people living in poverty, pop density, pollution sources, water withdrawals
files.label: VBA_Volta_Maps_2011_04_Analyse_Problematiques.pdf

dataFile.description: Maps from Dec 2011 showing social data overlaid on environmental, e.g. % people living in poverty, pop density, pollution sources, water withdrawals
